long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extensions encourages clicking on the Twitter like button by giving positive messages whenever you hit like on a tweet. An animation as well as positive text will appear and encourage you to keep going.

This extension only works with Twitter, and only affects the like button. It's only changes visual properties, doing nothing in real function.

Update 1.1:
Fixed extension to work with new Twitter formatting
